title: White Screen or No Display
description: Fix white/blank screens or missing display output on Windows systems.

steps.title: Hardware Toggle
steps.instruction: Turn the monitor off and on. If using a laptop, use the Fn keys (like Fn+F4) to toggle display output modes.

steps.title: Disconnect Peripherals
steps.instruction: Unplug all USB devices except mouse/keyboard and restart. A faulty USB device can cause BIOS/Display hangs.

steps.title: Safe Mode Boot
steps.instruction: Restart and force-shutdown 3 times to enter Automatic Repair → Advanced options → Startup Settings → Safe Mode.

steps.title: Check Graphics Output
steps.instruction: If using a Desktop, ensure the monitor is plugged into the GPU ports, NOT the motherboard ports.

steps.title: Reset Monitor Settings
steps.instruction: Use the physical buttons on the monitor to perform a 'Factory Reset' or change the 'Input Source' manually.
